directions: Combine almond milk and pudding mix in a saucepan and bring to a boil, stirring constantly, over medium heat. As soon as pudding boils, reduce heat to low and continue cooking and stirring until pudding thickens, about 5 minutes.
Remove from heat and stir in chocolate chips until melted. Pour into graham crust and refrigerate until set, about 2 hours.
ingredients: 1 (5 ounce) package non-instant chocolate pudding mix (such as JELL-O® Cook and Serve)
¼ cup vegan chocolate chips (such as Enjoy Life®)
1  vegan graham cracker crust (such as Annie's®)
½ cup vegan whipped cream (such as So Delicious® Cocowhip™)  (Optional)
title: Vegan Chocolate Pie
